org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming

Class StrictJsonWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming.AbstractRecordWriter
      • org.apache.hive.hcatalog.streaming.StrictJsonWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordWriter
    Deprecated. 
    as of Hive 3.0.0, replaced by StrictJsonWriter

    @Deprecated
public class StrictJsonWriter
extends AbstractRecordWriter
    Streaming Writer handles utf8 encoded Json (Strict syntax). Uses org.apache.hive.hcatalog.data.JsonSerDe to process Json input

      • encode

        public Object encode(byte[] utf8StrRecord)
              throws SerializationError
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: AbstractRecordWriter
        Encode a record as an Object that Hive can read with the ObjectInspector associated with the serde returned by AbstractRecordWriter.getSerde(). This is public so that test frameworks can use it.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
